alert.note: Alert for Dickinson (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 6:43PM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Dickinson, northwestern Geary, northwestern Riley, southeastern Ottawa, Clay and south central Washington Counties through 715 PM CDT... At 642 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong outflow boundary along a line extending from 4 miles southeast of Linn to 6 miles south of Clay Center to 3 miles southeast of Minneapolis. Movement was southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Clay Center, Solomon, Wakefield, Riley, Bennington, Milford, Leonardville, Green, Wells, Manchester, Longford, Oak Hill, Niles, Talmage, Milford Lake and Moonlight. This includes Interstate 70 between mile markers 267 and 271. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
